scripts.build-android: node record-start-time.js; npm run bundle-android; cd android; ./gradlew assemblerelease; cd ..; node record-end-time.js; npx ts-node apk-renamer.js; node open-file-location.js
scripts.build-android-without-open-file-location: node record-start-time.js; npm run bundle-android; cd android; ./gradlew assemblerelease; cd ..; node record-end-time.js; npx ts-node apk-renamer.js
scripts.bundle-android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
